transparencyDescription: Your channel, your narrative. We believe in freedom of speech.

1.title: Freedom of Speech
1.description: Upload what you enjoy to do. No videos will be censored. Everyone should be entitled to its own idea.

2.title: Open Source
2.description: All codes of our platform will be published on GitHub, and will be available and visible to anyone.

3.title: Community Based
3.description: All our decisions will be shared transparently with the help of users in our social platforms.

usersDescription: Our vision is a future where the web is clear of invasive banners and where everyone supports content creators.

0.title: No Ads
0.description: Watch any videos without distractions and targeted advertising. You will be free to watch any content without annoying time-wasting ads.

1.title: Creativity
1.description: Creators can express themself with no concerns about the future of their account.

2.title: Supported by Viewers
2.description: Paying a very small amount â€“ based on the lot of time and quality of resources â€“ we shall be able to sustain our project and creators too!.

3.title: Scalable Revenue

innovativeDescription: We use the best and innovative technologies now on the market.

0.title: Decentralized Content
0.description: Every assets on Etherna, from your avatar to your videos, are stored on a decentralized file system call Swarm. We canâ€™t delete anything.

1.title: Permanent Data
1.description: Videos cannot be deleted from our decentralized storage. This means that youâ€™ll be responsible for what you upload.

extendableDescription: We provide an indexing protocol that everyone can modify and extend, so users can change the index to their favorite one and enjoy the content they like.

0.title: Custom Index
0.description: You can specify an index different from ours. That means everyone can build their own index and share it, making the users access completely different contents.

1.title: Custom Gateway
1.description: You can also specify a different Swarm Gateway to download assets and videos.
